name: Let's Gooonut DAYO!
description:
This is a free fan game made to honor Amono Pikamee aka the world's best Denki kettle monsters. I will try to keep updating content as long as I can. May the memory last forever.

This game does not have any enemies that will cause damage, only delicious donuts.  All you need to do is to eat as many donuts as possible so that Pikamee can keep running.

Instruction

  • Using W, A, S, D to move.
  • Using Left-click can shoot Tomoe to the position where you clicked,
  • Using  Right-click can dash to the location where it is. 
  • Donuts will be eaten because you touch them or stay in your dash path.
  • You have a total of 3 Tomoes. 
  •  Let's gooonut!

(The current version is still beta, and it will be kept updated. So forgive me there is no sound in the game.)

(Also I forgot to remove debug function, so you can hit the space bar to spawn donuts. If you see this, have fun! )
